==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=欲速则不达}}

===Etymology===
From ''{{w|Analects}}'' 13.17:
{{zh-x|無 欲 速，無 見 小利。'''欲速.則.不達'''；見 小利 則 大事 不成。|Do not be desirous to have things done quickly; do not look at small advantages. Desire to have things done quickly prevents their being done thoroughly. Looking at small advantages prevents great affairs from being accomplished.}}
